duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct the execution of an annual Process Improvement agenda with a focus on throughput and quality improvement.
Drive standardization across locations by implementing value engineering initiatives.
Provide technical leadership for the acquisition and design of new equipment and facilities.
Define flexible equipment, tooling, and floor space to improve capital efficiency.
Lead the engineering team and work cross-functionally to optimize manufacturing operations.
Partner with plant managers and operations leaders to enhance capital efficiency.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors of Mechanical Engineering or similar (Master's Preferred)
